title: Logging onto chat service
body: Since patch 6.13 I have to reset LolClient atleast twice for the game to connect me to the chat otherwise i'm unable to play with friends nor talk in champion select and I get disconnected after every game so I can't even see my stats, damage done etc. Please don't redirect me to troubleshooting connection because it doesn't help at all

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing a connection issue to our servers; though, it's a bummer to hear the connection guide wasn't able to help fix this up.  For your specific issue, please [submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to reach out to our tech team who can look into this further.  I recommend gathering these set of logs to attach to your ticket to help find out what's going wrong. 

[Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)
[Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
Try launching the game as an administrator, or launching from the **lol.launcher.admin** found in the top of your LoL folder.
